TASK.NAME: cn.com.servyou.platform.sb.dao.sjgt3.impl.Gt3NsrNcpqyxxDaoImpl.queryIsNcpqy
TASK.DESCRIPTION: 查询金税三期数据库中的增值税农产品核定表――农产品企业标志

SQL.NAME: query_jssq_ncpqybz
SQL.CLAUSE: select count(1) from HX_ZGXT.sb_zss_ncpjxkcshdb t where djxh = ? and t.hdqxz >= to_date(?,'yyyy-MM-DD') and t.hdqxq <= to_date(?,'yyyy-MM-DD') and (t.zfbz_1 is null or t.zfbz_1='N')

TASK.NAME: cn.com.servyou.platform.sb.dao.sjgt3.impl.Gt3NsrNcpqyxxDaoImpl.queryNcpxx
TASK.DESCRIPTION: 查询金税三期数据库中的增值税农产品核定表――农产品信息

SQL.NAME: query_jssq_ncpxx
SQL.CLAUSE: select t.cpmc_1, t.hyncpmc, t.ncpdhsl from HX_ZGXT.sb_zss_ncpjxkcshdb t where djxh = ? and t.hdqxz >= to_date(?,'yyyy-MM-DD') and t.hdqxq <= to_date(?,'yyyy-MM-DD') and (t.zfbz_1 is null or t.zfbz_1='N')
